meanings: get[fall] sick[ill], be taken ill, get diseased, lose one's health, be sick[ill]

phrases.phrase: 늙고 병든 몸은 눈먼 새도 안 앉는다

vlive.korean: 그렇다면 제가 병든 닭 성대모사를 한번 해보겠습니다. - 닭 중의 닭, 병든 닭. I'll imitate a sick chicken. - A sick chicken. 듣기 View video Jellyfish Entertainment : 구구단(gugudan) 데뷔 쇼케이스- Welcome to Wonderland!
vlive.english: I'll imitate a sick chicken. - A sick chicken.

vlive.korean: 아주 먼 옛날에 병든 아버지를 모시고 소금을 팔아... - 야, 됐고. A long time ago, a man sold salt to support his sick father... - All right. 듣기 View video V Special : [꽃브로] 꽃미남 브로맨스 - 정준영&로이킴 EP4. "목포, 히트다 히트"
vlive.english: A long time ago, a man sold salt to support his sick father... - All right.

vlive.korean: 온 마음이 병들고 지친! My whole heart is sick and tired! 듣기 View video BTOB : 비투비 - 비트콤 #63 (2018 BTOB TIME -THIS IS US- 콘서트 첫째 날)
vlive.english: My whole heart is sick and tired!

vlive.korean: 병들고 있었잖아요. - 그냥 너 얼굴 자체가 병맛이에요. We were holding bottles. - Your face itself is just great. 듣기 View video FTISLAND : [FULL] FTISLAND 여름밤의 꿈 COMEBACK VLIVE [DRIVE-IN FTISLAND]
vlive.english: We were holding bottles. - Your face itself is just great.

vlive.korean: 2 병드셨대요. - 나눠서. He had two bottles. - We shared it. 듣기 View video THE VIBE : [REPLAY] VIBE X 김흥국 "원샷 ONE SHOT"
vlive.english: He had two bottles. - We shared it.
